comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create PHP file.
2. Keeping editor open, rename the PHP file.
3. In the editor, enter some code, then hit control + spacebar.
4. An error dialog appears with the title "Error Executing Command". It contains an abbreviated version of the error messages in the workspace log file which follows:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2007-05-01 13:05:33.312
!MESSAGE "Content Assist" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more information.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2007-05-01 13:05:33.312
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0

More information:
This only happens if the editor for the file in question remains open during the rename.
